channel.title: Mopar RSS Feed
channel.description:
What is the Mopar RSS feed location?
I found out that when trying to use an aggregator, or a stream reader (not a web browser), the URL for the RSS feed doesn't [b]actually[/b] return the feed data. It returns the TOS page.
The reason (I believe) it does this is because the web browsers save the cookies saying that you accepted the TOS, but RSS aggregators don't have a cookie system.
